text: Chatting with former #CIA “spymaster” @JackDevine_TAG at a fundraiser for @familycenters. Interesting insights! http://t.co/yj87AH3SZt

#HappyThanksgiving! Grateful to be spending the holiday with my family, my greatest blessing of all. Best wishes for a safe and joyful day!
Enjoyed speaking on the Women in Leadership panel at the Greater New Haven Chamber of Commerce! #TheBigConnect http://t.co/JgOPQkl85F

...Please make time to vote and remind others to vote too. It is our right AND our obligation.
Today is Election Day! The future of our state and changes in national policies that affect our children and grandchildren are at stake....
Tomorrow is #ElectionDay. The future of our state & changes in national policies are at stake. Please vote! It's our right AND obligation.

My advice for the audience: don't be afraid to take a risk, and focus on everyday successes measured one step at a time -- they add up!
Great to join @tamronhall & Frozen songwriter Kristen Anderson-Lopez discussing women & success @TIME & @RealSimple. http://t.co/IQBlirLGQt

Cut ribbon on Linda & Vince McMahon Center for Women and Children at Gini's House, treating moms battling addiction. http://t.co/GIITmtrVWI

Put on my old CEO hat to talk to financial execs about business. Hard to believe it's been 5 yrs since I left #WWE http://t.co/dPOQkUWU5p
Meeting Ukrainian Pres. Petro Poroshenko: I admire his efforts to protect his citizens from more Russian aggression. http://t.co/mXxylaC4uc

My thoughts are with all who lost loved ones in the terrorist attacks & the people of our military who keep our country safe. #NeverForget

Have you voted yet? I know how anxious election days are for candidates, and I urge everyone to support their choices in CT's GOP primary!
It's Primary Day in CT. Please vote!
Have you registered to vote? CT's GOP primary is Tuesday, August 12!
Happy to join NJ Gov. @ChrisChristie tonight, supporting GOP candidate for governor @TomFoleyCT! http://t.co/r5Yrbn4GtP
With @ErnieAnastos @MyFoxNY. Women are half the workforce but only 20% of execs. Let's keep working to change that! http://t.co/y50PBuO7uo
I'll be interviewed by @ErnieAnastos on tonight's Fox5 NY News at 6 talking about an important issue: advancement of women in the workforce.
3D mammography will help Greenwich Hospital @GreenHosp detect breast cancer early and enable best possible treatment. http://t.co/Poj8eS4J8d
Happy 4th of July! Grateful for the #freedom our founders fought so hard to achieve. Best wishes to all for a fun and safe celebration!
What’s even better than #icecream on a hot July day? Soft serve! #NYT http://t.co/5YOqmzCEP5
Growing up in NC, I remember segregated restrooms, lunch counters & schools. I knew discrimination was wrong then, just as it's wrong today.
Today marks 50 years since the signing of #CivilRightsAct1964. Thinking of those who fought and died to end the injustice of segregation....
So glad to pay tribute to my friend, Gov. Jodi Rell, honored tonight by the @WaterburyGOP at its annual dinner. http://t.co/HrvsWS5Ohp
Inspiring TEDx talk by my friend Stacey Schieffelin @ybfbeauty on helping women entrepreneurs pursue their dreams! http://t.co/lS4imiYbEz
Roses started blooming this weekend. Hello, #summer! http://t.co/m27FI9eWMJ
RT @AriFleischer: For a WH whose motto is "Don't Do Stupid 'Stuff'", they sure did a lot of stupid 'stuff' with the Taliban release.
Proud mother and grandmother at 3-year-old's end-of-school performance! http://t.co/Ze9ZL8ntwL

Thinking of all the fallen heroes and families who have lost loved ones serving our country. Your sacrifice is not forgotten. #MemorialDay
Fun day as “mystery reader” in granddaughter’s preschool class! Nothing sweeter than having a grandkid jump in my arms & squeal w/ delight.
Honored to get Humanitarian Award from  Catholic Big Sisters & Big Brothers: celebrating matches like Jade & Sue! http://t.co/cxb4oYomUn
Chatted tonight w/Xerox CEO Ursula Burns, one of only 23 women currently serving as CEOs of Fortune 500 companies. http://t.co/KuC5NuEAa7
A highlight of the night: having my daughter @StephMcMahon introduce me! http://t.co/285i9aYD14
From my speech: "If you're a mom, all you ever want is what's best for your children." http://t.co/If2B3GvyQj

Advice for a future in business: show leadership. Don't just ask for mentors, mentor someone else. @sacredheartuniv http://t.co/QJmAPOHqdC
Advice from @StephMcMahon on having it all: Know what you want to do & set strategies to get there @sacredheartuniv http://t.co/ZoqAf1v7db

RT @StephMcMahon: On our way to @sacredheartuniv for (my mom) @Linda_McMahon first interview in her "Women Can Have it All" series! http://…
Happy Easter! Enjoying the day with my family. I hope you are enjoying the holiday as well!
Best part of receiving tonight's Prescott Bush Award from #ctgop was sharing the honor with part of my family! http://t.co/cY0ga4eGW3
Honored to accept the Prescott Bush Award from the CT Republican Party. #ctgop http://t.co/dmZ4Fsx64v
Chatting w/Gov. Jeb Bush, keynote speaker at tonight's #ctgop Prescott Bush Dinner. http://t.co/DIBMwUmdA5
Shocked by death of The Ultimate Warrior, a legend in our industry. I was honored to introduce him as he took his rightful place in #WWEHOF.
Way to go, UConn! Hope the women can repeat tonight with a championship of their own!
Good luck to UConn’s Huskies! I’d love to see national championships for both men’s and women’s basketball teams!
RT @ACPUSA: Jon Stewart and Sarah Palin don't agree on much, but they do #AgreeOnThis http://t.co/BRkGQIiUX8 #veterans
So proud of @StephMcMahon as she walked a few hundred #WWE global business partners thru future branding strategy. http://t.co/GuT2rofwun
My granddaughter climbing rock wall at #WrestlemaniaAxxess in New Orleans.  She made it all the way up & rang bell! http://t.co/cOT6BLlOpf
#WWEHOF was awesome & always my favorite #WWE event. Opportunity to celebrate legends & inspire Superstars who will themselves be inductees!
Thanks to the Fairfield/Westchester County Business Journals for naming me one of its Women Making an Impact. Congrats to all the honorees!
Cutting ribbon on new USO Warrior & Family Center at Bethesda: a place where wounded vets can heal, relax & rebuild. http://t.co/xYjAO50SUH
Introducing honorary #WWE Diva and USO Champion Elaine Rogers! http://t.co/eDKkaPHYjo
What a performance from this year's Legacy of Hope Award recipient, the American Military Spouses Choir! http://t.co/CBq3id5mxw
As 1st recipient of USO-Metro's Legacy of Hope Award, I'm honored to represent #wwe introducing this year's award. http://t.co/dbJAQVAFE7
Check out my escorts for the evening! @WWE @_sgtslaughter @TheMarkHenry http://t.co/JKtTTQKfTd
Saluting our troops on behalf of @WWE at the USO of Metropolitan Washington's annual awards. Honored to be here! http://t.co/Y5pbXcQgDC
So excited spring was here when I saw my daffodils starting to bloom yesterday... & today they are covered in snow! http://t.co/v5rZ48a24e
Want to know more about the women whose small businesses were honored at the Ladies Making History event? Read this: http://t.co/Zrkk20Gan6
So honored to be presenting grants to women entrepreneurs at the Ladies Making History event in Stamford! http://t.co/NKzVAMDkWD
Happy St. Patrick's Day! May the luck of the Irish be with you all!
Thanks to #wwe team for producing a PSA for @ACPUSA, a nonprofit that pairs returning vets with workforce mentors. http://t.co/xU7IlErvGF
Met @Janefonda today: Loved her words about starting a “3rd Act” at age 60. I did! I left #WWE to run for Senate. http://t.co/FPANtErqoT
Praying for a peaceful resolution to the crisis in #Ukraine.
As #Olympics end, I had thrill of watching my little granddaughter win a silver medal in her first skating competition. What fun! So proud.
Just met with @GabbyGiffords. So impressed with the leadership she’s shown toward making America safer! http://t.co/BGAuzdVl2q
Fun hearing Sen. @marcorubio remembering his days growing up watching #WWE! http://t.co/hQOISz1WAd

As a business owner, I believe in lighting the path forward for future entrepreneurs. Check out my latest oped!
http://t.co/ZpgW5DE802
Yet another snowy day here in CT! Hope everyone is staying safe and warm. I'm ready for spring! http://t.co/tRVBikQXqX
@jippyg great meeting you, Jill!
Surprise 80th birthday party for @GloriaSteinem at #MAKERS2014! An American icon. http://t.co/3G2wotolVd
Inspiring to meet @GabbyGiffords & @ShuttleCDRKelly at #MAKERS2014. Standing ovation for her remarkable speech! http://t.co/urPB3k3xub
Amazed by @Sam_Gordon6: 10-yo football phenom wowed us at #MAKERS2014. This girl's a role model now & a future Maker! http://t.co/JYUHA7xnIO
#MAKERS2014 Fascinating conference! Started chronicling & promoting 1st 50 yrs of Women's Movement. Now focus will be on the next 50 yrs!
Fond memories of #ShirleyTemple. Mom loved her movies & sang songs to me as a kid. I shared DVDs w/ my granddaughters. A timeless treasure!
Incredible to meet @GloriaSteinem, a trailblazer in women's rights! Glad to be part of the #MAKERS2014 Conference: so many amazing women.
Great article in Stamford Advocate on the CEO Roundtable: http://t.co/2whAAr0DD8
Even a CEO always has more to learn! That's especially true when expanding business abroad. I learned that at #WWE: https://t.co/ClzLRUypde

Want to be a good leader? Hire a good team! I learned that as CEO of #WWE:
https://t.co/kQ2FIdVrMF

Want to be a good leader? Lead by example, even on “the little things,” as I did as CEO of #WWE:
https://t.co/gBHCH8JA4n
Here's another insight for future CEOs: how a company like #WWE decides to expand to new divisions: https://t.co/D0NhVwMeWS
Ever wonder how to run a successful company like #WWE? I'll share some insights I hope will help future CEOs! https://t.co/lHaDJCMmef
Excited to speak to UConn-Stamford students at school’s 1st CEO Roundtable tonite. Hope to help spark some ideas among future entrepreneurs!
End of an era w/ passing of Mae Young, a trailblazer and role model for women in the world of sports entertainment. http://t.co/eG6JQcOKf8
If unions, corporations, and Congress itself can receive #ACA exemptions, don't we all deserve one? http://t.co/3kRkqIiJMM
Brrr!  A frigid, snowy CT. Skiers like powder, but 1 granddaughter was sad snow wouldn't stick together to make a snowman. Stay safe & warm!
